Barb_Swipe.help: Shred your opponent with several quick Swipes from your Spines. Barb Swipe deals minor damage over time. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast
Barb_Swipe.targetHelp: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Lunge.help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Lunge.targetHelp: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Spine_Burst.help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Spine_Burst.targetHelp: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Charged_Armor.help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Charged_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing, lethal and energy damage.

Lightning_Field.help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Lightning_Field.targetHelp: You are taking damage from the Lightning Field.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Conductive_Shield.help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a Conductive Shield that will conduct many sorts of energy away from your body. Conductive Shield grants high resistant to Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as good resistance to Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Conductive_Shield.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to fire, cold, energy, and negative energy damage.

Electric_Fence.help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Electric_Fence.targetHelp: You are immobilized by the Electric Fence.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!
